A password must be:
• between 8 - 72 characters long
• contain at least one number
• at least special character: ~ ` ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ - + = { [ } ] | : ; < , > . ? /

login_intro_part1: My name is Simon, I am your Study Buddy.
login_intro_part2: Sign in by entering the information below.
not_logged_in_redirect: You are not logged in. Redirecting to login screen
achievement_default_error: An error occurred while fetching achievements
tutorial_user_profile: Wow, lookin´ good on that profile picture! On your user profile, you're the boss! Change your name, switch up your email address, and level up that password game.  Want to flex your learning muscles?  You get to choose how many cards you conquer per session.  Feeling multilingual?  Pick your preferred language, and decide if you're in the mood for some learning notifications. And oh, the magic word is 'Save' – don't forget to give it a tap! Sending loads of love and learning vibes your way, 🦊Simon
tutorial_edit_card: Welcome to the card creation wonderland! Unleash your creativity, edit existing cards, and even upload images to spice up your learning journey.  It's your canvas, so paint it with knowledge! Sending oodles of love and heaps of fun your way, 🦊Simon
tutorial_deck_view: Welcome to your deck command center! Dive into the details: see how grand your deck has become and how many cards await your mastery.  Fancy a deck makeover?  You can change its name, split it, export the wisdom within, and edit individual cards. But here's the real magic – your learning history awaits!  Above all, gear up for a learning session that'll leave you feeling unstoppable. Or, feeling curious for a quick peek today? Sending love and knowledge vibes, 🦊Simon
tutorial_learn_card_view: Welcome to your flashcard fiesta! Ready for the flip?  Click the rotate button to reveal the back, and click again to return to the front-row seat of knowledge. The feedback buttons are your trusty companions.  Clicking them not only helps you but also guides you to the next card in your learning adventure. Embrace the joy of learning! 🚀 Let the fun begin! 🦊Simon"
tutorial_peek_card_view: Feeling a bit spontaneous? Perfect! In the Peek Learning Session, it's all about your pace.  Click the Rotate button for a sneak peek at the flip side, and with another click, you're back to the front. Ready for more? Hit the Next button to dive into the next card waiting to share its secrets. Enjoy the adventure of learning! 🦊Simon
